name: banking-app-workshop-runner
description: Root runner to start backend (Spring Boot) and frontend (Angular) together

scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:frontend: npm ci --prefix frontend || npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.start:en: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend:en"
